post_title: New Classic Card Chronicles episode announcement! Sept 1st
post_content:
It’s the half way point, so new Classic Card Chronicles podcast episode announcement! 
September 1st, we will be releasing an episode interviewing Chris Browne, Jamie Blundell, Scott Levy, Hank Levy and possibly more on the subject of T206 error cards! All experts in their respective fields, we will be talking about their collections, the process in which printing freaks occurred, how errors should be treated in the hobby and what the future holds. We’re excited for y’all to see this 🙂

[url]https://youtube.com/@ClassicCardChroniclesPodcast[/url]
